sys_relationship.name: 同一の電話番号

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_relationship"><sys_relationship action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><advanced>false</advanced><apply_to/><basic_apply_to>x_bllt_bs_cc_inquiry</basic_apply_to><basic_query_from>x_bllt_bs_cc_inquiry</basic_query_from><insert_callback/><name>同一の電話番号</name><query_from/><query_with><![CDATA[/*(function refineQuery(current, parent) {

    var INQGR = new GlideRecord('x_bllt_bs_cc_inquiry');
    INQGR.addNotNullQuery('u_phonenumber');
    INQGR.addQuery('u_phonenumber', parent.u_phonenumber);
    INQGR.addNotNullQuery('u_phonenumber');
    INQGR.query();

    var n = 0;
    var Ids = '';

    while (INQGR.next()) {
        //レコードのメールアドレスと同一のレコードを羅列
        if (n == 0) {
            Ids = "sys_idIN" +  INQGR.sys_id;
        } else {
            Ids = Ids + ',' + INQGR.sys_id;
        }
        n++;
    }

    gs.info("【村松 参上】" + Ids);
    current.addEncodedQuery(Ids);

})(current, parent);
*/]]></query_with><reference_field/><related_list/><simple_reference>false</simple_reference><sys_class_name>sys_relationship</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>muramatsu.keishin@blueship.co.jp</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-20 07:13:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>e270bbbe1b0c16103de3fdd2cd4bcba6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>同一の電話番号</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CCテンプレート" source="x_bllt_bs_cc">ff092a9b1bbf86106e132f092a4bcb30</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CCテンプレート">ff092a9b1bbf86106e132f092a4bcb30</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_relationship_e270bbbe1b0c16103de3fdd2cd4bcba6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>muramatsu.keishin@blueship.co.jp</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-21 05:10:30</sys_updated_on></sys_relationship><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=e270bbbe1b0c16103de3fdd2cd4bcba6"/><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey>e270bbbe1b0c16103de3fdd2cd4bcba6</documentkey><fieldname>name</fieldname><language>ja</language><sys_created_by>muramatsu.keishin@blueship.co.jp</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-20 07:13:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>afa0bbbe1b0c16103de3fdd2cd4bcbe4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>muramatsu.keishin@blueship.co.jp</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-20 07:13:40</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_relationship</tablename><value>同一の電話番号</value></sys_translated_text></record_update>
